article_title: Amazon is looking to hire 100,000 employees to keep up with demand
article_description: Amazon is looking to hire 100 000 new employees for its warehouse and delivery operations in the U S  to keep up with demand during the current coronavirus outbreak  the company said today  Workers in its U S  fulfillment centers will also get an extra  2 per
